Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment.Application

  • public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    Runs the whole restaurant reservation system.
    Author:
    shuvamnandi

      Checks which tables are available and can be booked by a customer.
      static void checkReservation(ReservationFile resF, int size)
      Checks which tables are available and can be booked by a customer, depending on the size.
      void clearDessert(int choice)
      clearDessert() clears the content of Desserts text file, so that modified data can be rewritten if any menu item is removed or edited.
      void clearDrink(int choice)
      clearDrink() clears the content of Drinks text file, so that modified data can be rewritten if any menu item is removed or edited.
      void clearMainCourse(int choice)
      clearMainCourse() clears the content of Main Course Items text file, so that modified data can be rewritten if any menu item is removed or edited.
      static void clearReservation()
      clearReservation() clears the content of the Reservation file, so that modified data can be rewritten while canceling reservations.
      void clearSetPackage(int choice)
      clearSetPackage() clears the content of Packages text file, so that modified data can be rewritten if any menu item is removed or edited.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main() controls the whole program
      static void printHomeScreen()
      printHomeScreen() prints the Home Screen of the restaurant.
      void printMenu()
      printMenu() prints the menu to be displayed while asking which kind of menu items need to be displayed.
      static void removeReservation(ReservationFile res)
      removeReservation()
      void updateMenu()
      updateMenu() prints the menu to be displayed while asking which kind of menu items need to be displayed.

      • clearDessert

        public void clearDessert(int choice)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        clearDessert() clears the content of Desserts text file, so that modified data can be rewritten if any menu item is removed or edited.
        Parameters:
        choice - controls whether a menu item is to be removed or edited.

        java.io.IOException

      • checkReservation

        public static void checkReservation(ReservationFile resF,
                                    int size)
        Checks which tables are available and can be booked by a customer, depending on the size.
        Parameters:
        resF - brings the data of all the reservations which is used to return an array of objects of class Reservation.
        size - is used while checking the availability of tables for a particular size.
